Package com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap

Interface Summary
IDissolveCriteria Implementations has the responsability of decide if Dissolver must dissolve two features.
IDissolveCriteria.IDissolvedFeatureBuilder Builds features from a dissolve operation.
ISpatialDissolveCriteria Forces to IDissolveCriteria to fetch geometries from ReadableVectorial (for performance reasons, once a criteria has verified a spatial conditions, it caches IGeometry, to avoid reading them many times)
 

Class Summary
AdjacencyDissolveCriteria OJO! Si las geometrias se crean externamente, asumimos que están reproyectadas.
AdjacencyDissolveVisitor This Visitor generates a dissolve of input layer based in adjacency criteria: it dissolves two polygons, if and only if they are adjacent.
AlphanumericDissolveVisitor This Visitor generates a dissolve of input layer based in alphanumeric criteria: it dissolves two polygons with the same dissolve attribute value, and doesnt care if they are adjacent or not.
DissolveGeoprocess Processes each geometry of a polygonal vectorial layer, looking for its adjacent polygons.
DissolveVisitor This FeatureVisitor processes each geometry of a polygon layer, looks for adjacent polygons and verify values of a dissolve field.
FeatureDissolver Dissolve features in base of a given dissolve criteria.
FunctionSummarizer For a given key set of numeric fields to summarize, and the summarization functions selected by user, it computes this summarization values.
GenericDissolveVisitor  
MultipleFieldsDissolveCriteria  
SingleFieldAdjacencyDissolveCriteria Its a SingleFieldCriteria that adds adjacency condition: once a feature has passed the single field value dissolve criteria (it has the same specified field value) it must be adjacent to the seed feature to dissolve them.
SingleFieldDissolveCriteria Decides if dissolve two features based in an alphanumeric criteria: two features will be dissolved if they have the same value for a given (and single) field.
